message.body: Heya! Would it be possible for you to pick me up at front and girard? I can bike up but....yea.....if you can't, no prob, I'll make it up there wet or no!
No problem. will get u at 450 ish. leaving here at 430....
Awesome, thx so much! Just let me know when yr here!
Getting off at 9:40...still ok if I come over?
Sure, thats earlier and i'm around

Hey you! Yes you! You helped me build things for water bears! Wow! In order to repay you, I'd like for you to help me one more time...by coming up with a tasty cocktail to serve at the show. Saturday august 20th, 5pm, the studio. I'll provide pizza,
Hiya we enjoyed your production very much! congratulations!
:) My mom made sure we read the back & had some good understanding of water bears b4 the show started. i think her reading teacher came out. fun!
